channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- AirPort Base Station Firmware Update
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- AirPort Base Station Firmware Update

item.title: CVE-2019-8572|2024-08-04T21:24:28.340Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved input validation. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-8575|2024-08-04T21:24:28.919Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved data deletion. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. A base station factory reset may not delete all user information.

item.title: CVE-2019-8581|2024-08-04T21:24:27.842Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. A remote attacker may be able to leak memory.

item.title: CVE-2019-8588|2024-08-04T21:24:29.071Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved input validation. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. A remote attacker may be able to cause a system denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2019-8578|2024-08-04T21:24:29.189Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-7291|2024-08-04T20:46:46.360Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: A denial of service issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. An attacker in a privileged position may be able to perform a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2019-8580|2024-08-04T21:24:27.838Z -- apple -- airport%20base%20station%20firmware%20update
item.description: Source-routed IPv4 packets were disabled by default. This issue is fixed in AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.8.1, AirPort Base Station Firmware Update 7.9.1. Source-routed IPv4 packets may be unexpectedly accepted.
